transcript:
Customer: Hello

Executive: Hello

Customer: Hanji ji kaun baat kar raha hai?

Executive: Kisan Vijay Bhandari se.

Executive: Hanji sir bataiye wapas call kar rahe ho aap kya ho gaya?

Customer: Aapka call aata hai is number se jab main aapko baat karta tha.

Executive: Wo mera nahi aaya tha.

Customer: Chutti pe ho na sir aaj?

Executive: Samjhe?

Executive: Main chutti pe hu aaj.

Executive: To Saloni ka call aaya hoga aapke paas wo meri manager ka.

Customer: Ha to main isliye jabhi to karaya to is call aayi thi is number se.

Executive: Are wo to aapka call aa gaya hai. Ek aur cheez ye naya dekha hai maine Tally on web Tally on web. Ye kya hai isme?

Executive: Ye matlab aisa hota hai na jo Tally software hota hai ek to wo aap system mein download karke chalate ho, theek hai? Aur ek aap jaise IndiaMART chala rahe waise aap Tally on web chala sakte ho.

Customer: Par isme nahi pe hamari ek alag team baithti hai.

Executive: Aap Tally on web wala jo option aapko dikh raha hai na waha pe aap query dalo to hamari ek team baithti hai uske liye ek alag team bitha rakhi hai humne. Aap uske bare me bata de.

Customer: Achcha.

Executive: Haan ji.

Customer: To unse baat kar lenge. Isme matlab aise kya hai aap mail list system mein isme kya hai naya?

Executive: Kis mein?

Customer: Isme kya hai matlab isme kya hai jo inhone naya option add kara hai?

Executive: Tally

Executive: Kis cheez ka puch rahe hai sir aap?

Customer: Ye Tally web ka ye kya hai?

Executive: Ye main wahi to bata raha hu waha pe aap pe aap aise hai team alag se humne team bitha rakhi hai.

Executive: To waha pe query kariye to team se call aa jayega aapko. Wo pehle wala pehle wala option nahi aaya wo cash on delivery ka wo tha pehle ek baar.

Executive: Cash on delivery ka to koi option nahi tha hum to kuch bech hi nahi sakte the isliye.

Customer: Nahi pehle payment tha isme tha na matlab payment IndiaMART ke through hota tha pehle.

Executive: Nahi wo to band kar diya sir humne saal bhar ho gaya usko to.

Customer: Ha nahi saal bhar to ho gaya to ab aane ka nahi wo option.

Executive: To hume band karna pada wo nahi aayega option dobara.

Customer: Achcha to isme bahut hi problem aa rahi hai na koi party ko trust wagaira hi ho ye koi party advance dalte nahi.

Executive: Ha wo to sir aap hi ko convince karna padega uske liye.

Customer: Hmm.

Executive: Theek hai sir aur kuch query hai?

Customer: Theek hai theek hai.

Executive: Theek hai.
summary:
Concerns:

- Wants to know about Tally on web option.

- Cash on delivery option not available.

- Facing trust issues with parties.



Resolution:

- Explained Tally on web and its support team.

- Informed cash on delivery option is discontinued.

- Suggested to convince parties for advance payments.



Next Steps: 

None

Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- tally on web, cash on delivery, payment, trust
